channel.title: How i can add special attack on a dragon claw ore other weapon
channel.description:
how i can add special attack on a dragon claw plz help my.
ty ;D

item.title: How i can add special attack on a dragon claw ore other weapon
item.dc:creator: @glowindagger glowindagger
item.description:
@glowindagger wrote:

[code]import java.io.*;

public class special {
public void loginSpec(client c, int item) {
switch(item) {
case 1215:
case 1231:
case 8002:
case 1249:
case 1263:
case 1305:
case 1377:
case 1434:
case 3204:
case 4587:
case 5680:
case 5698:
case 5716:
case 5730:
case 6739:
case 7158:
case 859:
case 861:
case 4827:
case 35:
case 667:
case 746:
case 2402:
case 8100:
case 4151:
case 4153:
c.l33thax(12323);
c.l33thax(7574);
c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;

	default:
		c.removeSpec(12323);
		c.removeSpec(7574);
		c.removeSpec(7599);
		c.removeSpec(7549);
		c.removeSpec(8493);
		c.removeSpec(7499);
	break;
}

}

public void needSpecial(client c, int item, int target) {
if(target != 3) {
return;
}
switch(item) {
case 1215:
case 1231:
case 1249:
case 1263:
case 1305:
case 1377:
case 1434:
case 3204:
case 4587:
case 5680:
case 5698:
case 5716:
case 5730:
case 6739:
case 8002:
case 7158:
case 859:
case 861:
case 4827:
case 35:
case 667:
case 746:
case 2402:
case 8100:
case 4151:
case 4153:
c.l33thax(12323);
c.l33thax(7574);
c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;

	default:
		c.removeSpec(12323);
		c.removeSpec(7574);
		c.removeSpec(7599);
		c.removeSpec(7549);
		c.removeSpec(8493);
		c.removeSpec(7499);
	break;
}

}
public void specialAttacks(int ID) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
if (c.specialAmount >= 0 && c.specialAmount <= 24) {
c.sendFrame126(“S P E C I A L A T T A C K”, 12335);
c.fsBar(0, 0, 12325);

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(60); usingSpecial = true; }
that should do it… u forgot to add the case 8002

[code]import java.io.*;

public class special {
public void loginSpec(client c, int item) {
switch(item) {
case 1215:

c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);

		c.removeSpec(7574);
		c.removeSpec(7599);
		c.removeSpec(7549);
		c.removeSpec(8493);
		c.removeSpec(7499);

}

}

public void needSpecial(client c, int item, int target) {
if(target != 3) {
return;
}
